Here is the Python code as per your specification:

```python
def insert_after_index(list_arg):
    list_arg.insert(71, 185.43)
    return list_arg
```
This function takes as argument "list_arg", and inserts a value of 185.43 at index 71 (the position immediately after index 70). The modified list is then returned. The list will have one additional element.
